A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Had about an hour too long of Finn and a weak character gallivanting around Monte Carlo\, but besides that\, this was an excellent movie.\n\nI'd bet money that a solid majority of the people hating this movie are fanboys upset that they didn't see their flashing laser swords or Star Wars tropes re-used for the millionth time.  It's time to let the past die.
